poemsDataJson.list_full: 長(なが)からむ 心(こころ)も知(し)らず 黒髪(くろかみ)の 乱(みだ)れて今朝(けさ)は ものをこそ思(おも)へ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Is it forever//That he hopes our love will last?//He did not answer.//And now my daylight thoughts//Are as tangled as my black hair.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Nagakaran|Kokoro mo shirazu|Kuro-kami no|Midarete kesa wa|Mono o koso omoe
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: みたれてけさは ものをこそおもへ
poemsDataJson.author: 待賢門院堀河(たいけんもんいんのほりかわ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 契りを結んだ翌朝の、心変わりを案じる恋の物思い
